bsccsp.formula: (function () { if ((acc.values['bscsba'] + acc.values['bsccs']) == 0){ return 0 } else{ return (acc.values['bsccs'] / (acc.values['bscsba'] + acc.values['bsccs']))}})()
bsccsp.name: Caught Stealing Percentage

bsffp.formula: (function () { if ((acc.values['bsfast'] + acc.values['bsfpo'] + acc.values['bsferr']) == 0){ return 0 } else{ return ((acc.values['bsfast'] + acc.values['bsfpo']) / (acc.values['bsfast'] + acc.values['bsfpo'] + acc.values['bsferr']))}})()
bsffp.name: Fielding Percentage

bsfrf.formula: (function () { if (acc.values['bsfgp'] == 0){ return 0 } else{ return ((acc.values['bsfast'] + acc.values['bsfpo']) / acc.values['bsfgp'])}})()
bsfrf.name: Range Factor

bspera.formula: (function () { var innings = acc.regulation_duration ? acc.regulation_duration : 27; if (acc.values['bspip'] == 0){ return 0 } else{ return ((acc.values['bsper'] * innings) / acc.values['bspip'])}})()
bspera.name: Earned Run Average

bcsgpg.name: Goals Per Game

psrat.formula: (function () { if (acc.values['psatt'] == 0) {return 0} else{  var num1 = (((acc.values['pscomp'] / acc.values['psatt']) * 100 - 30) * 0.05); var num2 = ((acc.values['psyds'] / acc.values['psatt'] - 3) * 0.25); var num3 = (acc.values['pstd'] / acc.values['psatt'] / 0.05); var num4 = (2.375 - (acc.values['psint'] / acc.values['psatt'] * 25)); num1 = num1 < 0 ? 0.0 : (num1 > 2.375 ? 2.375 : num1); num2 = num2 < 0 ? 0.0 : (num2 > 2.375 ? 2.375 : num2); num3 = num3 < 0 ? 0.0 : (num3 > 2.375 ? 2.375 : num3); num4 = num4 < 0 ? 0.0 : (num4 > 2.375 ? 2.375 : num4); return ((num1 + num2 + num3 + num4) * 100.0 /6.0)}})()
psrat.name: QB Rating

ptin20.name: Punts Not Returned Past 20 yard line

bksppg.formula: (function () { if (acc.values['bksgp'] == 0){ return 0 } else{ return acc.values['bkspts']/ acc.values['bksgp'] } })()
bksppg.name: Points Per Game

psrat.formula: (function () { if (acc.values['psatt'] == 0) {return 0} else{  var num1 = (((acc.values['pscomp'] / acc.values['psatt']) * 100 - 30) * 0.05); var num2 = ((acc.values['psyds'] / acc.values['psatt'] - 3) * 0.25); var num3 = (acc.values['pstd'] / acc.values['psatt'] / 0.05); var num4 = (2.375 - (acc.values['psint'] / acc.values['psatt'] * 25)); num1 = num1 < 0 ? 0.0 : (num1 > 2.375 ? 2.375 : num1); num2 = num2 < 0 ? 0.0 : (num2 > 2.375 ? 2.375 : num2); num3 = num3 < 0 ? 0.0 : (num3 > 2.375 ? 2.375 : num3); num4 = num4 < 0 ? 0.0 : (num4 > 2.375 ? 2.375 : num4); return ((num1 + num2 + num3 + num4) * 100.0 /6.0)}})()
psrat.name: QB Rating

ptin20.name: Punts Not Returned Past 20 yard line

gysgpg.name: Goals Per Game

hkgsv.formula: (function () { var total = acc.values['hkgsog'] - acc.values['hkggla']; if(total >= 0) { return total } else { return 0 } })()
hkgsv.name: Saves

hkggaa.formula: (function () { var duration = acc.regulation_duration ? acc.regulation_duration : 3600; if (acc.values['hkgmin'] == 0){ return 0 } else{ return (acc.values['hkggla'] * duration / acc.values['hkgmin'])}})()
hkggaa.name: Goals Against Average

hkgspct.formula: (function () { if (acc.values['hkgsog'] == 0){ return 0 } else{ return ((acc.values['hkgsog'] - acc.values['hkggla']) / acc.values['hkgsog'])}})()
hkgspct.name: Save Percentage

hksavgpts.formula: (function () { if (acc.values['hksgm'] == 0){ return 0 } else{ return ((acc.values['hksgl'] + acc.values['hksast']) / acc.values['hksgm'])}})()
hksavgpts.name: Points Per Game

lxggaa.formula: (function () { var duration = acc.regulation_duration ? acc.regulation_duration : 3600; if (acc.values['lxgmin'] == 0){ return 0 } else{ return (acc.values['lxggla'] * duration / acc.values['lxgmin'])}})()
lxggaa.name: Goals Against Average

lxgspct.formula: (function () { if (acc.values['lxgsog'] == 0){ return 0 } else{ return Math.max(0, acc.values['lxgsog'] - acc.values['lxggla']) / acc.values['lxgsog']}})()
lxgspct.name: Save Percentage

lxiavepts.formula: (function () { if (acc.values['lxigp'] == 0){ return 0 } else{ return ((acc.values['lxigl'] + acc.values['lxiast']) / acc.values['lxigp'])}})()
lxiavepts.name: Avg Points Per Game

lxishpct.formula: (function () { if (acc.values['lxisog'] + acc.values['lxisoff'] == 0){ return 0 } else{ return (acc.values['lxigl']) / (acc.values['lxisog'] + acc.values['lxisoff'])}})()
lxishpct.name: Shooting Percentage

lxisogpct.formula: (function () { if (acc.values['lxisog'] + acc.values['lxisoff'] == 0){ return 0 } else{ return acc.values['lxisog'] / (acc.values['lxisog'] + acc.values['lxisoff'])}})()
lxisogpct.name: Percentage of Shots On Goal

lxipgsog.name: Avg Shots On Goal Per Game

lxifopct.formula: (function () { if (acc.values['lxifow'] + acc.values['lxifol'] == 0){ return 0 } else{ return acc.values['lxifow']/(acc.values['lxifow'] + acc.values['lxifol'])}})()
lxifopct.name: Faceoff Percentage

sosgpg.formula: (function () { var games = acc.values['wins'] + acc.values['losses'] + acc.values['ties']; if (games == 0) return 0; return acc.values['goals'] / games; })()
sosgpg.name: Goals Per Game

sogsvp.formula: (function () { var sog = acc.values['sogga'] + acc.values['sogsv']; if (sog == 0) return 0; return acc.values['sogsv'] / sog; })()
sogsvp.name: Save Percentage

soggaa.formula: (function () { if (acc.values['sogmin'] == 0) return 0; var duration_minutes = acc.regulation_duration ? acc.regulation_duration / 60 : 90; return acc.values['sogga'] * duration_minutes / acc.values['sogmin'] })()
soggaa.name: Goals Against Average
